name: Being a gamer girl is fun :)
name_original: Being a gamer girl is fun :)
description:
You're a freshman girl, and your biggest dream is to be a game dev someday. Try not to screw up?

Every conversation in this text adventure game is based on the developers' personal experiences. Some are nearly word-for-word!

However, the names of parody companies, games, or organizations do not reflect real experiences with said parties; they are for contextual/entertainment purposes only.

Team Members: 

  • Julia Shen - writing, art
  • Helen Yang - UE4 implementation, additional writing

This game was made in 45 hours for Bear Jams Spring 2021, hosted by Game Design & Development @ Berkeley. We absolutely did not follow the theme, but we had fun! Thanks for hosting.
